title: Pre-Service Teacher Competency Development Program for Addressing Complex Social Issues

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Individual device-based situational task performance and collaborative activities

learning_goals: Learners can analyze various social phenomena cases according to three complexity levels (basic/intermediate/advanced) and design appropriate instructional strategies
Learners can improve the quality of their instructional design (clarity, realism, effectiveness) by over 80% through formative assessment feedback
Learners can expand their professional behavioral repertoire (teaching methods, resource utilization, classroom management) by at least three categories through peer evaluation
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
